extension.summary: Kodi PBX Addon aims to provide a completely new Home Telephony Experience by integrating Asterisk into Kodi.
extension.description: By integratating Asterisk into Kodi you can use it as a front-end for certain functionality (like playing voicemail) and to automate some tasks (like pausing video on incoming calls), among other features.
extension.disclaimer: You have to have a properly set-up and running Asterisk server.
